title: Снежный папа
overview: An ordinary hairdresser Irina, having separated from her husband, is raising her daughter Masha alone. Unexpectedly, fate gives Irina a gift: meeting a successful businessman Oleg Tsarev. Trying to please him, Irina comes up with a new successful life for herself, in which she is the owner of an elite beauty salon, and her daughter is a student at a private school. Irina and Oleg's relationship is moving towards the registry office, but suddenly her husband Kolya, whom she has not officially divorced, appears on the threshold of Irina's apartment. Kolya is determined to get his family and Irina's love back.
